thumb.title: Even If You Say / 小春六花 [Synthesizer V Cover]
thumb.description: SUPER EUROBEAT VOL.92収録「Even If You Say / Virginelle」をメインボーカルSynthesizer V 小春六花、バックコーラス夏色花梨・宮舞モカでカバーしました！Originalhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sPv66-jn6FQCredit- Even If You Say - Virginelle- Vocalist - Elena Gobbi Frattini- Writer - Giancarlo Pasquini, Luigi Raimondi, Fabrizio Rizzolo, Sandro Oliva- Producer - Dave Rodgers- Label - A Beat CInstrument- Cubase Pro 12- Roland Zenology, Roland XV-5080, Roland JD-800, KORG TRITON, KORG OPSIX native, Xfer records Serum 2, Native Instruments KONTAKT7, Steinberg Groove Agent SE...SuganoMusic- Web https://suganomusic.com/- x https://x.com/suganomusicStreaming- Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/63d3avZr0Ft2zYq8GSVyST- Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/jp/artist/suganomusic/1502207754- LINE Music: https://music.line.me/webapp/artist/mi00000000127ee910- Amazon Music: https://music.amazon.co.jp/artists/B086V95J37/suganomusic
thumb.last_res_body: うぽつ 雑コラで笑っちゃった うぽつ
